text: Not so fast! Mirada Kerr opened up about her pregnancy and revealed that husband Evan Spiegel, CEO and cofounder of Snapchat, won ’ t be documenting her labor on the photo and video sharing platform. “ No. My husband ’ s a very private man, ” the Victoria ’ s Secret model, 34, said during her visit to Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Tuesday, February 6. Kerr later explained that she and Spiegel, 27, don ’ t plan on showcasing their baby - to - be via Snapchat at all. “ Oh no, No, I don ’ t think so. What I love about Snap is you can send to your friends and family, like, you know, the little intimate moments that you ’ re sharing. So my family in Australia
